list.dek: A sprawling piano opera starring Matthew and Eleanor Friedberger's grandmother, Olga Sarantos, this record is every bit as terrible and fantastic as it sounds: A convoluted tangle of spoken word and keyboard gurgles, RMC is an experiment in oral history-as-pop, an extraordinarily detailed portrait of mid-century Chicago, and a magnificent failure.
